instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-00165 NO GREEN LIGHT NO FAN-PP3V3_S5 SHORT
threads.message:
820-00165 very lite water damage at O/I and very lite at u7090...i was replace O/I and reball U7090.
no green light no fan pp3v3_s5 short.
ppbus_g3h - 8.2v
p3v42 - 3.4v

threads.title: 820-00165 NO GREEN LIGHT NO FAN-PP3V3_S5 SHORT
threads.message:
"pp3v3_s5 short."
Exact ohm value?

SMC_RESET_L level?

threads.title: 820-00165 NO GREEN LIGHT NO FAN-PP3V3_S5 SHORT
threads.message:
U5110:
pp3v3_s5-0.3v
SMC_RESET_L 3.3V

threads.title: 820-00165 NO GREEN LIGHT NO FAN-PP3V3_S5 SHORT
threads.message:
"pp3v3_s5-0.3v"
What this mean?
I asked about ohm value, you said to have short there...

threads.title: 820-00165 NO GREEN LIGHT NO FAN-PP3V3_S5 SHORT
threads.message: Dido mode 23ohm

threads.title: 820-00165 NO GREEN LIGHT NO FAN-PP3V3_S5 SHORT
threads.message:
Not a pure short, but really bad value.
Possibly nothing heats if try voltage injection.
Lift one side L7560 and see where the low value remains.

Check for bad values on the other big coils.

threads.title: 820-00165 NO GREEN LIGHT NO FAN-PP3V3_S5 SHORT
threads.message: sorry the value on pp3v3_s5 is 004ohm(full short) i was lift l7560 but the same

threads.title: 820-00165 NO GREEN LIGHT NO FAN-PP3V3_S5 SHORT
threads.message: Low enough to use voltage injection method...

threads.title: 820-00165 NO GREEN LIGHT NO FAN-PP3V3_S5 SHORT
threads.message:
o.k fint the short now i have 3.3v on pp3v3_s5_AVREF_SMC but i have 0.02v on pp3v3_s5_REG_L
REPLACE l7560 and Q7560?

threads.title: 820-00165 NO GREEN LIGHT NO FAN-PP3V3_S5 SHORT
threads.message:
AVREF_SMC is not the same with 3V3_S5 from L7560.

Which is the ohm value, or diode mode to ground at L7560???

threads.title: 820-00165 NO GREEN LIGHT NO FAN-PP3V3_S5 SHORT
threads.message: 330ohm

threads.title: 820-00165 NO GREEN LIGHT NO FAN-PP3V3_S5 SHORT
threads.message: so its probably o.k

threads.title: 820-00165 NO GREEN LIGHT NO FAN-PP3V3_S5 SHORT
threads.message:
So you have 3.3V at L7560, or 0.02V?
Specify when you post voltage, or diode mode.
Or directly omit the "V" when you post diode mode!!!

threads.title: 820-00165 NO GREEN LIGHT NO FAN-PP3V3_S5 SHORT
threads.message:
on L7560 WITH CHARGER 0.2V BOTH SIDE!!
AT DIODE MODE 350ohm!

threads.title: 820-00165 NO GREEN LIGHT NO FAN-PP3V3_S5 SHORT
threads.message: diode mode of course without charger!!!

threads.title: 820-00165 NO GREEN LIGHT NO FAN-PP3V3_S5 SHORT
threads.message:
Don't write ohm, if you measured in diode mode (nor volt also).
Just write .350 and will understand is diode mode; ohm value will be slightly different.

Post U7501 volatges; pins 23, 12, 13, 22, 29, 21.

threads.title: 820-00165 NO GREEN LIGHT NO FAN-PP3V3_S5 SHORT
820-00165 NO GREEN LIGHT NO FAN-PP3V3_S5 SHORT
threads.message:
"12 -0v"
Missing SMC_PM_G2_EN?
If yes, reball SMC.

threads.title: 820-00165 NO GREEN LIGHT NO FAN-PP3V3_S5 SHORT
threads.message: great it was water under SMC now works thanks!

threads.title: 820-00165 NO GREEN LIGHT NO FAN-PP3V3_S5 SHORT
threads.message:
the board is back.....dead, green and orange light, NO fan spin NO bypass SMC.
PM_PWRBTN_L 1.1V, 0 then 1.1v when trigger  SMC_ONOFF_L .

threads.title: 820-00165 NO GREEN LIGHT NO FAN-PP3V3_S5 SHORT
threads.message: Did you reball, or just reflow SMC?

threads.title: 820-00165 NO GREEN LIGHT NO FAN-PP3V3_S5 SHORT
threads.message: reball but if it can be the smc i will do again..

threads.title: 820-00165 NO GREEN LIGHT NO FAN-PP3V3_S5 SHORT
threads.message: even replace

threads.title: 820-00165 NO GREEN LIGHT NO FAN-PP3V3_S5 SHORT
threads.message: What about 3V3_S5/SUS?

threads.title: 820-00165 NO GREEN LIGHT NO FAN-PP3V3_S5 SHORT
threads.message:
3v3_s5 3.4v
3v3_sus 0v no short

threads.title: 820-00165 NO GREEN LIGHT NO FAN-PP3V3_S5 SHORT
threads.message: Check RTC signals.
